String.string: This place seems to be artificial. How could such a place exist?
The cave is full of nectar with a peculiar, azure glow.
Jump down and go to the Extraction Chamber.
You feel a shock wave coming from the Processing Room.
Go to the Processing Room Entrance.
There's no sign of any butterflies...just eggs.
Escape the Processing Room and go to the Regent's Vault.
Destroy the eggs and defeat the Nightmare Gossamer Regent.
Use the {@LinkCreature:3201#1501#Teleportal} to escape Gossamer Vault (Hard) and speak with Elleon.
